net.sitecore.android.sdk.api

Class RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sitecore.android.sdk.api.RequestBuilder

  • public class RequestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for building requests:
    • ReadItemsRequest
    • DeleteItemsRequest
    • EditItemsRequest
    • CreateItemRequest

      • itemVersion

        public RequestBuilder itemVersion(int version)
        Specifies the version number of the content item.

        By default the latest version is used.

        Parameters:
        version - item version.
        Returns:
        this builder.

      • setLanguage

        public RequestBuilder setLanguage(java.lang.String language)
        Specifies the context language for the request.

        Example : da-DK.

        Default language : default.

        Parameters:
        language - language.
        Returns:
        this builder.

      • withPayloadType

        public RequestBuilder withPayloadType(PayloadType payloadType)
        Specifies amount of fields to load. (MIN/CONTENT/FULL).

        One of PayloadType.

        Parameters:
        payloadType - PayloadType of fields payload in response.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        See Also:
        PayloadType

      • withScope

        public RequestBuilder withScope(RequestScope scope,
                       RequestScope... otherScopes)
        Specifies the set of the items that you are working with.
        Parameters:
        scope - scope of items.
        otherScopes - extra scopes of items.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if otherScopes > 2.

      • bySitecoreQuery

        public RequestBuilder bySitecoreQuery(java.lang.String query)
        Specifies Sitecore Query or Sitecore Fast Query
        Parameters:
        query - Sitecore query.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if query is already set.

      • setPage

        public RequestBuilder setPage(int pageNumber,
                     int pageSize)
        If the response contains numerous result items, you can use paging to obtain parts of the whole result set as pages.
        Parameters:
        pageNumber - number is the index of a given page in a set that starts with 0.
        pageSize - page size is the number of the result items that are presented in the page. Should be greater than 0
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if pageNumber < 0 or pageSize < 1.

      • updateFieldValue

        public RequestBuilder updateFieldValue(java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String value)
        Update field value. Used by CreateItemRequest and EditItemsRequest only.
        Parameters:
        key - field ID or name to update
        value - updated field value
        Returns:
        this builder.

      • build

        public ScRequest<? extends ScResponse> build()
        Creates ScRequest with specified parameters.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if request method isn't recognized.
